front.title: Extending the Presence Information Data Format - Location Object (PIDF-LO) for Assisted Global Positioning System (A-GPS) Data

abstract.t: This document defines how a device encapsulates Assisted Global Positioning System (A-GPS) data to ask a Location Information Server (LIS) to calculate the device's position, and return that information to the device. This communication will be completed using the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP), using Presence Filters specific to A-GPS in a (SUBSCRIBE) request, and a Presence Information Data Format - Location Object (PIDF-LO) as the (NOTIFY) reply.
